articles.title: Bitcoin Price Crashes to $106,000 As Bulls Eye Strong November
articles.author: Bitcoin Magazine
articles.summary: Bitcoin price has dipped to a new low of $105,200 today. Bitcoin price closed October with a decline of 4%, the first negative October since 2018. Bitcoin prices are under increased selling pressure amid tighter market conditions. Bitcoin's decline is the first since October 2013.
